title: What happens as distance between two plates change

content.prompt: A uniform electric field E exists between the two large, oppositely charged plates shown above.If the distance between the plates is increased without changing the charges on the plates, which of the following statements can be justified?

choices.label: The potential difference between the plates decreases.
The potential difference between the plates increases.
There will be no change in either the electric field strength or the potential difference.

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
